title: Additional funding in support of Linked grant ref: ST/J000655/1
abstractText:
This is an application for additional funding to support linked grant ST/J000655/1.
The grant requires additional funds of £13541.74.
impactText: The observations acquired with travel funds from this grant have been published in peer reviewed journals,
findingsText: This is a travel grant to allow scientists to travel to telescopes to observe the universe. All data is available in public archives. Education
